name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, Zefiel, Sakana, mikeronomicon, tttt, Catachresis, GeyserShitdick, shammack, atticusonline, lk, fmercury, littlefatdog, dropkickpikachu, Saint, brianstanwyck, afvbs)

name: fancyrat
text: I literally cannot find anything wrong with this post and still you lame him. There is no justification for this.

name: johnnyrocker
text: A comment left by johnnyrocker was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Carlyle, masterofmetroid, riotdejaneiro, radioelectric, MortisInvictus, Firehawk, fattypneumonia, alchemicnirvana)

name: johnnyrocker
text: A comment left by johnnyrocker was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Carlyle, masterofmetroid, riotdejaneiro, radioelectric, MortisInvictus, Firehawk, fattypneumonia, toyoda, alchemicnirvana, peng33)

name: carlyle
text: A comment left by carlyle was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Deusoma, Ciansy, usversusthem)

name: fineoakstructure
text:
Bullshit.

Johnnyrocker doesn't deserve lames for honestly laying down the reason why asherdan gets lames (double-posted or not). Read his statement again; there's nothing there saying that he hates asherdan, or that he agrees with the sentiment (even though he might). He simply puts forth the explanation that many, many assetbar posters would use, as stupid as it may be: people hate asherdan because of his general reputation, and thus even asherdan's mild or reasonable posts get lamed to high heaven.

It's not a good justification, but for many people, it seems to be justification nonetheless.

name: mangtastic
text:
Well.. He said everyone hates asherdan. If his statement is true, then he would technically hate asherdan as well.

Also, if you are on assetbar and you set your lame threshold to the point where you can see everyone's comments anyway, it don't make a lick of difference.
Just saying.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
what are you doing, mangtastic? I've made like two asherdan-related posts in my embarresingly long tenure on assetbar, and you've responded to them both in the last few hours.

That seems unlikely.

name: mangtastic
text:
Wow. I did not even notice that.

I've been rereading the archives (and actually reading the comments too this time around) in the wait for new comics to come out, and I have been interjecting a few comments here and there. I swear that posting on your asherdan posts is completely unmeditated.

name: smallberries
text: OTOH Asherdan throughout the archives routinely gets the FRIST PSOT, bastardizes Onstad to 'Stad and suggests that an element of that particular strip is subpar. My main irritation is seeing his commentary  at the top - what kinda personality obsesses over that?

name: asherdan
text:
Let's see...

I never use the words first post, let alone in all caps, I'm not bastardizing (lowering in quality or debasing) the dude's name I'm contracting it (incorrectly, for effect, I'll give), lighting off a discussion (the point of assbar comments?) with a critique is a valid methodology whether you particularly like it or not and the early in thread postings doesn't show an obsession (nice try at some more character assassination there, bubby) but merely happens when you're late to the party-farty.

Like you are to this months old thread.

ALSO: one of the definition of a berry is a small fruit. Your user name thus scans as small smallfruit.

Good or bad connotations, that's funny.

name: smallberries
text:
I took liberties with FRIST PSOT; you'd never stoop that low. But dang if you aren't nearly always first to the party, and pithy too. It's remarkable!

Also: I'm a fashionably late kinda guy.

Furthermore: Smallberries is my alias at Yoyodyne Propulsion Systems Where the Future Begins Tomorrow .

name: peng33
text: this is the first comment from asherdan I have ever seen that didn't carry with it at least a few lames.

name: asherdan
text: Supportive chubby for the generic double bump posting rocker.

name: icecube
text: It does seem slightly lame that he has addressed a comment to Ray as if expecting to get a reply. That could account for it.

name: deimosrising
text: Beef doesn't get nearly as much use out of Spanish as Ray does of the Polaroids he took of Mary-Ann's titties.

name: saint
text: although beef could probably calculate the difference using those two math books he told Juan he read.

name: relaxing
text: "When a woman walks up to me and says, 'You know what, sexy?' I say, " No , I don't know what it is, but I bet I can add up all the change in your purse, really fast .

text: Already a 5 by the first panel

name: canusdivinus
text: Nothing can detract from that most perfect of panels.

name: deusoma
text: What if Onstad replaced Ray's face with Goatse?

name: snatch22
text: So many points for mentioning Sriracha, the king of hot sauces.

name: senseihollywood
text: word

name: senseihollywood
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: closefriend
text: Where I come from, we call this "Rooster Sauce."

name: madnes
text: A comment left by madnes was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by dayvancowboy, lateadopter, VictoriaW)

name: juanclaudius
text:
Red Cock represent.
Makes quesadillas a Chi-Mex-Travaganza.

name: charchar
text: You can mix it with shoyu, garlic, and ginger for a killer dipping sauce for such as dumplings or brothers' eyeballs.

name: i_love_kate
text: Or add a little cornflour and stir it into such as a simple dish of beef and noodles.

name: i_love_kate
text: Uh, this is in reference to the soy sauce thing, not sriracha.

name: ctrl_z
text:
This is what I'll call it from now on. "Cock Sauce"

And I'll be referring to sex as "makin' whale music."

name: stormagnet
text: I've always heard it called Hot Cock Sauce.%u3000The real beauty is seeing this written on a handlettered sign beneath the display in the Vietnamese grocery store.

name: fuzzyshoo
text: The label on the shelf at my local pan-Asian grocer reads "Red Cock Sauce". It was the header picture for my blog until blogspot said "no you cannot have this anymore"

name: woodenteeth
text: as long as it's not ON your parts.

name: mattylite
text: Good thing for that comma.

name: atticusonline
text: Who else thought this said Cock sauce in my pants? Come on, don't lie.

name: envika
text: there is a strange harmony between comment and avatar here

name: envika
text: AAAAAAAAAND, i accidentally lamed you after complimenting your comment. fuck you, trackpad that clicks when you tap it.

name: atticusonline
text: Noooooooooooooooooo!

name: soupkaty
text: We also call it Rooster Sauce. And I have eaten many a sandwhich composed entirely of bread and rooster sauce. mmm.

name: robanhk
text: Indeed!

name: nurdbot
text: I love how Beef sass talks Ray in this arc. I await the day where I console my best friend with the same words after he wakes up with a hangover.

name: epicurus
text: I have a playlist on my computer called "Makin' whale music" which I play to cover the sounds of lovemaking. 5/5

name: madnes
text: Is SO good.

name: senseihollywood
text: SO MANY WHALES!

name: epicurus
text:
...and until I came back today and read this again I forgot where that expression came from and was starting to think I'd made it up myself.

Thank you Achewood.

name: trollcollins
text:
I love Beef's face in the 4th panel. I also love how one of Ray's lenses is discoloured, in the manner of a stain or bruise.

I need to find some context in which to say "Yo reados dos math books!"

name: epicurus
text: I can set this up, if you're serious.

name: canusdivinus
text:
I work with a guy who, although of Lithuanian descent and thus white as the polar caps, speaks Spanish almost constantly, to "practice". God DAMMIT I hate few things more than asking a question and getting what is, for my purposes, gibberish as a response. Takes a long-ass time to get him to speak English, his frickin' native tongue. So I tried a variation of this line on him. Results inconclusive.

Dan, just in case you ever read this, you're an asshole.

name: trollcollins
text: It is rude to respond to a question in a way you know the asker won't understand. Whether it's Spanish or highly technical jargon or Coptic or pig Latin, if you know the other person isn't familiar with it, using it a surefire way to advertise one's own douchbaggery.

name: trollcollins
text: IS a surefire way. Gall-darnit, Assetbar, let me edit my AM-addled errors!

name: neitherman
text: Beef is the insult master.

name: tsel
text: I would totally have quoted Tori Amos in my Saludatorian Address. Had I given one! :)

name: relaxing
text:
Hmmmmm
"You've got to know when it's time to turn the page"
"I haven't seen Barbados, so I must get out of this."

what would you use?

name: tekende
text: "Timmy and that purple monkey all went down."

name: trollcollins
text:
"An angel's face is tricky to wear constantly."

Oh hells yes all b-sides up in here.

name: relaxing
text: "Roll on, but you know I'm never satisfied with all the good things in my life"

name: tttt
text: Beef made an understandable error with the saltines

name: stormagnet
text: ...Or did he?!

name: cousinted
text: If he'd learned Spanish he could have been in his quatre-runner making jhale music is Francessca

name: epicurus
text: I don't know what's going on, but I think we're done here, cousinted.

name: ttagxamm
text: The comic is unfiltered sass, but the alt-text, "Life is an apology to be made at a later date."  That's a true cold sip of bitter ale.

name: helloftubby
text: man what fool is drinking cold bitter ale? slightly below room temperature people, i can not stree this enough!

name: ttagxamm
text:
Sheesh man, poetic license. "A true sip of bitter ale served at the optimal temperature" just doesn't sing , does it?

But if it makes you happy, s/cold/bracing. Cheers?

name: helloftubby
text: Cheers indeed. Also na zdrowie.

name: rowboat
text: He cold sipped that bitter ale.

name: epicurus
text: Please forgive my barbarism, but I cannot abide the lukewarm bitter ale. So warm a radiator covets.

name: snowman
text:
I love a cold bitter ale. Crisp , is the word I would use.

It is hot here in Phoenix.

name: vheissu
text: Also a fun word to describe beer: Crunchy. That is one Achewoodism that I have actually spread to the real world.

name: greenkoolayd
text: youre thinking of crispy .

name: vheissu
text: [url="http://achewood.com/index.php?date=08102007"]Nope.[/url] But I am crossing my fingers hoping that I know BBcode well enough to manage this comment without failing.

name: vheissu
text: Damnit. Try 2?

name: greenkoolayd
text: ohhhhhhhh...... my bad. since crispy is used more often, i didnt 'memmer that other similar adjective.

name: vheissu
text: We're cool.

name: feetnotes
text: Mary-Anne Feldman is the name of every girl I went to high school with.

name: tekende
text: That must have been confusing.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: i had to chubby both of these comments. both are just too grand.

name: 60teeth
text:
Ray is exceptionally good at not knowing other languages.

Maybe even the best.

name: dasilodavi
text: Deep and wide is the chasm across which these two contain their dichotomy.

name: nabeel84
text: The alt text is the best in this strip. Profound and hilarious.

name: dallovich
text: Great alt text indeed!

name: cormanosanchez
text: SRIRACHA

name: jonnay
text: Man, Mary-Anne Feldman was a whore anyway.

name: laikalost
text: "Making whale music..."  Let's just take a moment and consider that phrase, shall we?

name: bjorntd
text: Ray has a crush on fat chicks pass it on.

name: achilleselbow
text: No, it's Beef that is developing a preference for corpulent women. Though maybe he got it from Ray.

name: ealtdharkon
text: 5, saved by the alt text.

name: mattylite
text: At least his brain didn't get peeled out on by some teenagers.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: ...and 'sploded.

name: chachibenji
text: Roast Beef has got no mercy.

name: pogo
text: Stunning dialog.  Simple stunning.

name: puguglypress
text: I like when Onstad makes fun of other languages. It's not hateful, it's just funny as hell

name: wonelove
text:
747's peeling out in the runway...
drag racing each other...

name: cpnglxynchos
text: all playin' chicken on the runway...both pilots unsure if the other will pull up in time to save all their passengers. the fasten seatbelt indicator bings on. all those in the fuselage are clueless as they turn cell phones and Loud children off. a fireball. you jolt awake in your bed at home in a cold sweat. you gasp for breath and slowly fall back to sleep.
